jump_scares.spoiler: Pamela Voorhees jumps out at a fleeing counselor
Jason appears in front of Wade
Jason’s silhouette appears on the tent behind Amanda
Mike picks up something from the hole in the wall and drops it suddenly when he realizes it is a skull
A machete blade comes up from the floor in front of Mike as he looks under the door
A dog suddenly jumps up on the other side of the door, startling Clay
Donnie bumps into something
An arrow pierces Nolan’s head
A machete blade is driven into Chelsea’s head as she hides in the water under a dock
Some floorboards break under Jenna
A dead body drops in front of Jenna as she hides from Jason
Jason suddenly appears in front of Whitney
Jenna and Clay burst in to the house, startling Lawrence
In the flickering light, Jason can be seen standing behind Chewie
Chewie’s dead body drops down from the ceiling onto Lawrence. Seconds later, Lawrence turns around and comes face to face with Jason
Bree opens a curtain and Jason is suddenly standing behind her. [Video]
Jason drops down behind the policeman who is knocking on the door
A dead body lands on the car that Trent is in
Trent slowly moves towards a parked car when Jason suddenly appears behind him
Jenna is stabbed through the chest
Jason comes up behind Clay as he is on top of the bus
Jason bursts through the window behind Clay
Jason comes up through the dock and grabs Whitney. [Video]
